name: Sodium Sulfacetamide and Sulfur
indications: sodium sulfacetamide 8 % sulfur 4 % topical suspension indicated topical control acne vulgaris , acne rosacea seborrheic dermatitis .
contraindications: apply sodium sulfacetamide 8 % sulfur 4 % topical suspension twice daily affected areas , directed physician . wet skin liberally apply areas cleansed . massage gently skin 10-20 seconds , working full lather , rinse thoroughly pat dry . drying occurs , may controlled rinsing sodium sulfacetamide 8 % sulfur 4 % topical suspension sooner using less often .
warningsAndPrecautions: sodium sulfacetamide 8 % sulfur 4 % topical suspension available 16 fl oz ( 473 ml ) bottles , ndc 69367-245-16 .
adverseReactions: product contraindicated persons known suspected hypersensitivity sulfonamides , sulfur component preparation . product used patients kidney disease .
indications_original: Sodium Sulfacetamide 8% and Sulfur 4% Topical Suspension is indicated in the topical control of acne vulgaris, acne rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis.
contraindications_original: Apply Sodium Sulfacetamide 8% and Sulfur 4% Topical Suspension once or twice daily to affected areas, or as directed by your physician. Wet skin and liberally apply to areas to be cleansed. Massage gently into skin for 10-20 seconds, working into a full lather, rinse thoroughly and pat dry. If drying occurs, it may be controlled by rinsing off Sodium Sulfacetamide 8% and Sulfur 4% Topical Suspension sooner or using less often.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: Sodium Sulfacetamide 8% and Sulfur 4% Topical Suspension is available in 16 fl oz (473 mL) bottles, NDC 69367-245-16.
adverseReactions_original: This product is contraindicated for use by persons with known or suspected hypersensitivity to sulfonamides, sulfur or any other component of this preparation. This product is not to be used by patients with kidney disease.
